SELECT u.id as id, u.name as userName, u.phone as telephone, op.ROOTDK_COMMISSION_TYPE as rootdkCommissionType, op.ROOTDK_COMMISSION_Value as rootdkCommissionValue, op.ROOTCC_COMMISSION_TYPE as rootccCommissionType, op.ROOTCC_COMMISSION_Value as rootccCommissionValue, op.ROOTRS_COMMISSION_Type as rootrsCommissionType, op.ROOTRS_COMMISSION_Value as rootrsCommissionValue, op.BANK_NAME as bankName, op.BANK_HOST as bankHost, op.BANK_CARD as bankCard, op.MAIL as mail, u.create_time as createTime, op.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, u.status as status, op.DESCRIPTION as description, ur.role_id as roleId, role.name as roleName FROM user u LEFT JOIN operator op ON u.id = op.OPER_ID LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role role ON ur.role_id = role.id WHERE u.user_type = '01'
and u.name like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')
and u.phone like CONCAT('%', #{telephone},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO operator ( OPER_ID, rootdk_commission_type, rootdk_commission_value, rootcc_commission_type, rootcc_commission_value, rootrs_commission_type, rootrs_commission_value, bank_name, bank_host, bank_card, mail, update_time, description ) VALUES ( #{operId},#{rootdkCommissionType},#{rootdkCommissionValue},#{rootccCommissionType}, #{rootccCommissionValue}, #{rootrsCommissionType},#{rootrsCommissionValue},#{bankName},#{bankHost},#{bankCard}, #{mail},#{updateTime},#{description} )
mapper.select: SELECT u.id as id, u.name as userName, u.phone as telephone, op.ROOTDK_COMMISSION_TYPE as rootdkCommissionFlag, op.ROOTDK_COMMISSION_Value as rootdkCommissionValue, op.ROOTCC_COMMISSION_TYPE as rootccCommissionFlag, op.ROOTCC_COMMISSION_Value as rootccCommissionValue, op.ROOTRS_COMMISSION_Type as rootrsCommissionFlag, op.ROOTRS_COMMISSION_Value as rootrsCommissionValue, op.BANK_NAME as bankName, op.BANK_HOST as bankHost, op.BANK_CARD as bankCard, op.MAIL as mail, u.create_time as createTime, op.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, u.status as status, op.DESCRIPTION as description, ur.role_id as roleId, role.name as roleName FROM user u LEFT JOIN operator op ON u.id = op.OPER_ID LEFT JOIN user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role role ON ur.role_id = role.id where u.id = #{operatorId}

mapper.select: SELECT m.USER_ID as userId,m.USER_NAME as userName,m.TELEPHONE as telephone,m.MOBILE_PHONE as mobilePhone,m.REMARK as remark, m.WECHAT_NUM as wechatNum,m.PROVINCE as province,m.USER_ADDR as userAddr,m.MAIL as mail,m.QQ as qq,m.INS_COMPANY as insCompany, mg.MERCHANT_NAME as merchantName, m1.USER_NAME AS recommender,m2.USER_NAME AS dirRecommender,m.BANK_NAME as bankName,m.BANK_HOST as bankHost, m.BANK_CARD as bankCard,m.CREATE_TIME as createTime,m.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime,m.STATUS as status,m.CARD_TYPE as cardType,m.CARD_ID as cardId FROM t_member_basicinfo m LEFT JOIN t_merchant_manage mg ON mg.MERCHANT_ID = m.MERCHANT_ID LEFT JOIN t_member_basicinfo m1 ON m.RECOMMENDER = m1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN t_member_basicinfo m2 ON m.DIR_RECOMMENDER = m2.USER_ID WHERE m.USER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT m.USER_ID as userId,m.ORGANIZATIONS as organizations,m.USER_NAME as userName,m.CARD_TYPE as cardType, m.CARD_ID as cardId,m.CAR_NUM as carNum,m.CAR_FRAME_NUM as carFrameNum,m.ENGINE_NUM as engineNum, m.CHANG_TYPE as changType,m.REGISTER_TIME as registerTime,m.EXAMINE_TIME as examineTime, m.EXAMINE_TIME as engineNum,m.BUSINESS_INS_START_TIME as businessInsStartTime, m.TRAFFIC_INS_START_TIME as trafficInsStartTime,m.CAR_TYPE as carType FROM t_customer_basicinfo m WHERE m.USER_ID = #{customerId}
